Text.Page:
It's bad enough that you can't tell day from night in the crypt. But those destroyers will keep you from getting any rest.

Killian left them behindâ€”something about stealing the rest of Saleron's power.

And if you see any of our scouts, tell them to return to base. We don't need scouts to tell us these crypts are endless and overrun with the enemy.

Return to camp? Fine by me!

I've got news to report anyway: It's not just Killian's minions down here.

The argons are down deeper...and I've even seen them up here on occasion.

So yes, I'll return to base. I'm a scout, not a martyr.

That took longer than I thought it would, . Everything all right?

Argons? Here?

Things just got very bad, didn't they?
